name: Bring Back 1.6!
description: Brings back menus from 1.6 (you can still access new features)

change-levelinfolayer.name: Modify Level Info Layer
change-levelinfolayer.description: Enable to modify the level info layer and add a toggle button

change-editorpauselayer.name: Modify Editor Pause Layer
change-editorpauselayer.description: Enable to modify the editor pause layer and add a toggle button

change-creatorlayer.name: Modify Creator Layer
change-creatorlayer.description: Enable to modify the creator layer and add a toggle button
